[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
DEAD
enum DEAD {...}

Entity entvars_t::deadflag values

Values
DEAD_NO

(0) Alive

DEAD_DYING

(1) Playing death animation or still falling off of a ledge waiting to hit ground

DEAD_DEAD

(2) Dead, lying still.

DEAD_RESPAWNABLE

(3) The player is in a state where they can be respawned.

DEAD_DISCARDBODY

(4) No direct use of this
